modName: Faster Leveling and More Skill Points Per Level
modShortDescription: Sets parameters in progression.xml to give more skill points per level.
modDescription:
Sets parameters in progression.xml to give more [skill points](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-skill-points/) per level.

**[Download](https://github.com/pahbi/7DTD_Modlets/raw/main/skillpoints.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/26048-a20-modlets-lotl-perk-fast-plant-growth-super-iron-pickaxe/).

**Credits:** [Pahbi](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/pahbi/)
